c-0: ^That's great! I visited two tourist attractions on that region. It is Lake Lanao and the Margues Blue Lagoon, but, I don't know the info of the first one.
^Do you know where can I get the info about it?
^Maybe you can visit a school or go to someone who also loves to travel.
^Anyway, for the Margues Blue Lagoon, the local village where the margues blue lagoon is located has no other water source of potable drinking water before other than this lagoon.
^Despite its small above ground opening, the Margues Blue Lagoon depth is unknown for no one has ever reached its bottom yet.
^That's amazing. Have you tried to swim on it before?

^Not yet. Maybe next time with my friends. Oh! I almost forgot that there's another one that I know in BARMM and it is called Panampangan Island which is a sandbar and it is the longest sandbar considered in the Philippines stretching 4 kilometers.
^Alright. Thank you so much for the info
^No problem. By the way, do not forget to look for the info of Lanao Lake. If you want to recap the info just go to me.
